project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line interface (CLI) contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement the feature to add a contact to the contact book
Implement the feature to search for a contact in the contact book
Implement the feature to update an existing contact in the contact book
Implement the feature to delete a contact from the contact book
Implement functionality to read contacts from a JSON file
Implement functionality to write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above (adding, searching, updating, and deleting contacts)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
